comment.author: 32967294@N05
comment._content: I'm just writing about the hulk Eli Whitney that was blown up 200 yards (according to the reports) from the end of Queen's wharf. Some of her remains may well be still there - probably now they're in a reclaimation. She was sunk in 1877. Great image!
